text.nea.title: Definições de Not Enough Animations
text.nea.enable.animationsmoothing.toolt: Smooths out the arm/leg animations to make them look more natural and less jumpy
text.nea.smoothingSpeed.tooltip: The amount of smoothing to apply to the arm/leg animations
text.nea.enable.inworldmaprendering.tool: Renders the map in the world instead of just in first person
text.nea.enable.offhandhiding.tooltip: Hide offhand items when pulling a bow
text.nea.enable.rotationlocking.tooltip: Locks the rotation of the player's body to the rotation of the player's head
text.nea.enable.ladderanimation.tooltip: Adds an animation for climbing ladders(note: only ladders, not vines, scaffolding, etc.)
text.nea.enable.eatdringanimation.toolti: Adds an animation for eating and drinking
text.nea.enable.rowboatanimation.tooltip: Adds an animation for rowing a boat
text.nea.enable.horseanimation.tooltip: Adds an animation for riding a horse
text.nea.enable.dontholditemsinbed.toolt: Prevents the player from holding items while in bed
text.nea.enable.freezearmsinbed.tooltip: Prevents the player from moving their arms while in bed
text.nea.rotationlock.tooltip: The type of rotation locking to use
text.nea.enable.showlastusedsword.toolti: [Deprecated for removal! Use other mods for this feature!] Shows the last used sword on the player. This is just a visual effect without knowledge of the actual inventory. Please don't report 'bugs' that the sword is still rendered after throwing it away/putting it in a chest/etc.
text.nea.enable.crawling.tooltip: Adds an animation for crawling, replacing the vanilla 'crawling'(swimming) animation
text.nea.enable.rotatetoladder.tooltip: Rotates the player's body to face the ladder when climbing it
text.nea.holdUpItemsMode.tooltip: Makes the player to hold up items(like they are looking at them/holding them in front of them)
text.nea.holdUpItemOffset.tooltip: Modify how much the item is held up
text.nea.ladderAnimationAmplifier.toolti: The amount of movement to apply to the arms when climbing a ladder
text.nea.ladderAnimationArmHeight.toolti: The height of the arms when climbing a ladder
text.nea.ladderAnimationArmSpeed.tooltip: The speed of the arms when climbing a ladder
text.nea.enable.itemSwapAnimation.toolti: Adds an animation for swapping items from the main hand to the off hand and vice versa
text.nea.enable.tweakElytraAnimation.too: Tweaks the elytra flying animation to make it look more natural
text.nea.enable.petAnimation.tooltip: Adds an animation for petting wolfs and cats. Look at the wolf/cat while sneaking to pet it
text.nea.enable.huggingAnimation.tooltip: Adds an animation for hugging. Look at another player while sneaking to 'hug' them
text.nea.enable.narutoRunning.tooltip: Adds an animation for running in the style of Naruto(easter egg)
text.nea.enable.enableInWorldBookRenderi: Renders books in the world with their text. This is still a work in progress and may not work properly
text.nea.disableLegSmoothing.tooltip: Disables the smoothing of the legs
text.nea.enable.bowAnimation.tooltip: The type of bow animation to use
